trans-unit.source: , there are now three more similar validators:
trans-unit.target: ，现在还有三个类似的验证器：

trans-unit.source: .) Previously (contrary to its docstring) it was raising a
trans-unit.target: 。）以前（与其文档字符串相反），它提出了一个

trans-unit.source: Cornice provides helpers to build & document Web Services with Pyramid.
trans-unit.target: Cornice提供了帮助者使用Pyramid构建和记录Web服务。

trans-unit.source: ACLs are now handled per route and not per view. Thanks @circlingthesun (#287)
trans-unit.target: ACL现在是按路由处理,而不是按视图处理。谢谢 @circlingthesun (#287)
在 cornice/__init__.py 中添加一个 __version__工具。

trans-unit.source: Add a way to opt-out of the exception handling.
trans-unit.target: 增加一种退出异常处理的方式。

trans-unit.source: Add an option to disable Colander schema request binding. (#288)
trans-unit.target: 增加一个禁用Colander模式请求绑定的选项。(#288)

trans-unit.source: Add marshmallow request validation support (#475, thanks @ergo)
trans-unit.target: 增加棉花糖请求验证支持(#475,感谢@ergo)

trans-unit.source: Add support for Colander’s drop object
trans-unit.target: 添加对Colander的放置对象的支持

trans-unit.source: Add support for arrays on request body top level.
trans-unit.target: 在请求体顶层增加对数组的支持。
增加对上下文工厂的支持。

trans-unit.source: Add support for dynamic validation schemas for resources.
trans-unit.target: 增加对资源动态验证模式的支持。
增加对金字塔遍历的支持。#196

trans-unit.source: Add support for unflatted in querystring;
Add support for validation of input content other than JSON against Colander schemas: built-in support of form-urlencoded and configuration hooks for other content types #192
trans-unit.target: 增加对JSON以外的输入内容对Colander模式的验证支持:内置对其他内容类型的表单urlencoded和配置钩子的支持#192。

trans-unit.source: Add support for validation with specific JSON Content-Types (i.e application/merge-patch+json).
trans-unit.target: 增加对特定JSON Content-Type(即application/merge-patch+json)验证的支持。

trans-unit.source: Add support of custom predicates in resources (#344, thanks @VDigitall!)
trans-unit.target: 在资源中增加对自定义谓词的支持 (#344,感谢 @VDigitall!)

trans-unit.source: Add traverse support. For more information regarding Hybrid Applications see Pyramid documentation (#483).
trans-unit.target: 添加遍历支持。有关混合应用程序的更多信息，请参见 金字塔文档 （＃483）。
增加了跨源资源共享(CORS)支持。

trans-unit.source: Added a way to automatically document Cornice web services
trans-unit.target: 添加了一种自动记录Cornice网络服务的方法。

trans-unit.source: Added a way to plug validators easily.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一种轻松插入验证器的方法。

trans-unit.source: Added a way to specify the accepted Content-Type values. A 406 is raised if needed
trans-unit.target: 增加了一种指定接受的Content-Type值的方法。如果需要的话,会出现406

trans-unit.source: Added the license in the distribution tarball
trans-unit.target: 在发行版tarball中添加了许可证

trans-unit.source: Added venusion depth support to cornice.resource #187
trans-unit.target: 为 cornice.resource #187 添加了静脉深度支持。

trans-unit.source: Adding the ability to define services imperatively. (#335)
trans-unit.target: 增加定义服务的能力,势在必行。(#335)

trans-unit.source: Align Cornice with Pyramid ACL pattern: Dynamic ACLs based on resource are now possible (#452, thanks @wjehenddher)
trans-unit.target: 使Cornice与金字塔ACL模式一致。现在可以基于资源的动态ACL了 (#452,thanks @wjehenddher)

trans-unit.source: Allow Colander schemas with sequence fields in querystring
trans-unit.target: 允许Colander模式在querystring中包含序列字段。

trans-unit.source: Allow for explicitely named services created for resources.
trans-unit.target: 允许为资源创建明确命名的服务。

trans-unit.source: Allow i18n of colander error messages (#206)
Allow to reuse Pyramid existing routes in services (#477, thanks @ergo)
trans-unit.target: 允许在服务中重用金字塔现有的路由(#477,谢谢@ergo)

trans-unit.source: Assert proper behaviour of UTF-8 content JSON body (#366, thanks @thruflo!)
trans-unit.target: 断言UTF-8内容JSON体的正确行为(#366,谢谢@thruflo!)

trans-unit.source: Check for errors in the body of the view and in validators (was only checking in validators previously)
trans-unit.target: 检查视图主体和验证器中的错误(以前只检查验证器中的错误)。

trans-unit.source: Clarify docs for deferred colander validator. Thanks @antoineleclair (#352)
trans-unit.target: 澄清文档中关于延迟笸箩验证器的内容。谢谢 @antoineleclair (#352)
清理了一个不一致的地方

trans-unit.source: Completely rework the schema validation features (#376, #386)
trans-unit.target: 完全重新设计模式验证功能(#376,#386)

trans-unit.source: Constructors of resource decorated classed must now be
trans-unit.target: 资源装饰类的构造函数现在必须是

trans-unit.source: Cornice now accepts Marshmallow schemas instead of instances (#482, @ergo)
trans-unit.target: Cornice现在接受Marshmallow模式而不是实例 (#482,@ergo)
在金字塔中定义网络服务。

trans-unit.source: Disable CSRF check on predicate fallback view (fixes #458)
trans-unit.target: 在谓词回退视图中禁用CSRF检查(修复#458)

trans-unit.source: Display default values in the sphinx documentation extension, Thanks @MikaYuoadas (#284)
trans-unit.target: 在sphinx文档扩展中显示默认值,谢谢 @MikaYuoadas (#284)

trans-unit.source: Do not raise a 415 error when no content-type and no body (#354)
trans-unit.target: 当没有内容类型和正文时,不要引发415错误(#354)

trans-unit.source: Do not require a permission for the fallback view.
trans-unit.target: 不需要后退视图的权限。

trans-unit.source: Do not return content if response is
Ensure Colander schemas are a Mapping (#271)
trans-unit.target: 确保笸箩模式是一个映射(#271)

trans-unit.source: Fix Access-Control-Max-Age value if undefined on service (#338)
trans-unit.target: 修正服务上未定义的访问控制-最大年龄值(#338)

trans-unit.source: Fix CORS OPTIONS permission when using default_permission (#273)
trans-unit.target: 修正CORS OPTIONS使用default_permission时的权限 (#273)

trans-unit.source: Fix CORS protocol that was sometimes returning Access-Control-Expose-Headers on preflight request.
trans-unit.target: 修正CORS协议有时会在飞行前请求时返回Access-Control-Expose-Headers。

trans-unit.source: Fix Colander imports to make sure it remains optional (#400)
trans-unit.target: 修正Colander的导入,确保它仍然是可选的(#400)

trans-unit.source: Fix DeprecationWarning for unrecognized backslash escapes (#491)
trans-unit.target: 修正未识别反斜杠转义的DeprecationWarning (#491)

trans-unit.source: Fix auto-define of HEAD views from GET views.
trans-unit.target: 修正GET视图中HEAD视图的自动定义。

trans-unit.source: Fix check for CORS Allow Credentials. Thanks @treerao (#320)
trans-unit.target: 修正CORS允许证书的检查。谢谢 @treerao (#320)
修正关于升级反序列器的文档 (#402)
修正重复的CORS暴露的标题(#301)

trans-unit.source: Fix handling of invalid JSON input;
Fix reload in sphinx extension for Python 3. Thanks @JohnBrodie (#295)
trans-unit.target: 修正Python 3的sphinx扩展中的重载问题。谢谢 @JohnBrodie (#295)

trans-unit.source: Fix support of schema as class instead of instance (#523)
trans-unit.target: 修正对模式作为类而非实例的支持(#523)

trans-unit.source: Fix to use own validator for Header Accept (fixes #431)
trans-unit.target: 修正头接受时使用自己的验证器(修正#431)

trans-unit.source: Fix truncated JSON validation error message when request body does not contain valid JSON (#401)
trans-unit.target: 当请求主体不包含有效的JSON时,修复截断的JSON验证错误信息(#401)

trans-unit.source: Fix typo in testing docs. Thanks peletiah (#348)
trans-unit.target: 修正测试文档中的拼写错误。谢谢 peletiah (#348)
修正文档中的错别字。谢谢 @robvdl,@tisdall (#306,#313)

trans-unit.source: Fix usage of localizer in Errors when l18n is deactivated. (#505)
trans-unit.target: 修正l18n被停用时,在Errors中使用本地化的问题。(#505)

trans-unit.source: Handle HTTPNotFound and HTTPForbidden in Cornice. Fix some wrong behaviour with CORS support.
trans-unit.target: 处理Cornice中的HTTPNotFound和HTTPForbidden。修正CORS支持下的一些错误行为。

trans-unit.source: Handle default values in colander schemas (#253)
trans-unit.target: 处理笸箩模式中的默认值(#253)

trans-unit.source: Huge set of documentation improvements. Thanks @areski (#297)
Huge thanks to @dairiki for his help on this release!
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢@dairiki对这次发布的帮助!

trans-unit.source: If colander defines a default value, put it in request.validated;
trans-unit.target: 如果colander定义了一个默认值,把它放在request.validated中。

trans-unit.source: Improve Sphinx documentation for schema attributes (#270)
Improve documentation regarding content type negotiation and media type validation. Thanks @amotl (#91, #343, #350)
trans-unit.target: 改进关于内容类型协商和媒体类型验证的文档。谢谢 @amotl (#91,#343,#350)

trans-unit.source: Keep fields when colander schema set “unknown=preserve”
trans-unit.target: 当漏勺模式设置为“ unknown = preserve”时保留字段

trans-unit.source: Let the user choose the default content_type (#262)
trans-unit.target: 让用户选择默认的内容类型(#262)

trans-unit.source: Make resource test less dependent on Pyramid version (#312)
trans-unit.target: 减少资源测试对金字塔版本的依赖(#312)

trans-unit.source: Make tutorial work for python3 users (#471, thanks @rvandegrift)
trans-unit.target: 让python3用户也能使用本教程 (#471,thanks @rvandegrift)

trans-unit.source: Marshmallow schemas get request object added to their context during validation (#482, @ergo)
trans-unit.target: 棉花糖模式在验证过程中,请求对象会被添加到他们的上下文中 (#482,@ergo)

trans-unit.source: Moved Sphinx extension to dedicated repo (#379)
Moved project scaffold to dedicated repo (#238, #390)
trans-unit.target: 将项目脚手架移至专用回购库(#238,#390)

trans-unit.source: Please refer to upgrading docs for detailed migration instructions.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅升级文档以获取详细的迁移说明。

trans-unit.source: Properly handle content_type callables returning a single internet media type as scalar. Thanks @amotl (#343)
trans-unit.target: 正确处理content_type可调用的内容,以标量形式返回单个互联网媒体类型。谢谢 @amotl (#343)

trans-unit.source: Raise exceptions as-is if they are not subclasses of HTTPException.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们不是HTTPException的子类,则按原样引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Remove Cornice warning when returning string or array instead of JSON (#256)
trans-unit.target: 当返回字符串或数组而不是JSON时,删除Cornice警告 (#256)

trans-unit.source: Remove PasteScript from the Cornice template.
Remove duplicated list of test deps in tox file (#371)
trans-unit.target: 删除毒素文件中重复的测试列表(#371)

trans-unit.source: Service.cors_supported_headers are now filtered by method and CORS options are now handled in a more consistent way (#281).
trans-unit.target: Service.cors_supported_headers现在由方法过滤,CORS选项现在以更一致的方式处理(#281)。

trans-unit.source: Set CORS headers when an exception is raised (#261)
trans-unit.target: 当发生异常时,设置CORS头信息(#261)

trans-unit.source: Support for Colander inheritance (introduced in new versions of Colander)
trans-unit.target: 支持Colander继承(在Colander的新版本中引入)。

trans-unit.source: Support strict validation of querystring and body;
The default JSON renderer does not use
The full documentation is available at: https://cornice.readthedocs.io
trans-unit.target: 完整的文档可在以下网址获得：https : //cornice.readthedocs.io

trans-unit.source: To maintain consistency with cornice 1.2 as to the semantics of
trans-unit.target: 为了与玉米1.2保持一致,在语义方面

trans-unit.source: Translate Error description field when added with
trans-unit.target: 翻译错误描述字段,当与

trans-unit.source: Update JSON CSRF warning filter with a better regex
trans-unit.target: 用更好的regex更新JSON CSRF警告过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Update sphinxext to not display HEAD.
Updated the license headers of the files (to MPL v2.0)
trans-unit.target: 更新了文件的许可头(MPL v2.0)。

trans-unit.source: Use a string for the version number (cornice.__version__);
trans-unit.target: 使用一个字符串作为版本号(cornice.__version__)。

trans-unit.source: Use the tox matrix with Travis. (#272)
Warn if resource collection and record paths are not distinct. Thanks @circlingthesun (#292)
trans-unit.target: 如果资源集合和记录路径不一致,则发出警告。谢谢 @circlingthesun (#292)

trans-unit.source: add a way to ignore some modules when scanning with venusian.scan.
trans-unit.target: 在使用venusian.scan进行扫描时,增加一种忽略某些模块的方法。

trans-unit.source: add an optional ‘error_handler’ to view declarations.
trans-unit.target: 添加可选的“ error_handler”以查看声明。

trans-unit.source: add_view parameter to the Service class #198
added a Paster template for a quick start
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个快速启动的Paster模板

trans-unit.source: added class-based views and the resource decorator
trans-unit.target: 增加了基于类的视图和资源装饰器
增加了类级验证器和过滤器
增加了关于突起内部的文档

trans-unit.source: added support for the ‘OPTIONS’ HTTP Verb
trans-unit.target: 增加了对“ OPTIONS” HTTP动词的支持

trans-unit.source: allow multiple accept definitions for a service.
trans-unit.target: 允许一个服务有多个接受定义。
错误修正:现在可以通过

trans-unit.source: bugfix: schema was only being bound to the first request #197
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:模式只被绑定到第一个请求 #197

trans-unit.source: by default anymore, so the requirement has been dropped.
trans-unit.target: 默认的,所以这个要求已经被取消了。

trans-unit.source: cornice.errors and validation tests now use the builtin
trans-unit.target: cornice.errors和验证测试现在使用内置的
框架.验证器.笸箩_验证器

trans-unit.source: default schema values are assumed to be in the body
trans-unit.target: 默认的模式值被假定为在正文中。

trans-unit.source: deprecated the service.schema attribute. Use service.definitions instead.
get validator’s docstring for the automatic doc generation
trans-unit.target: 获取验证者的文档字符串以自动生成文档

trans-unit.source: header correctly event if its value contains zero number of white spaces between commas (#422)
trans-unit.target: 头部正确事件,如果它的值包含零个逗号之间的空格(#422)

trans-unit.source: header sent in requests against a list of allowed ingress content types
trans-unit.target: 根据允许的入口内容类型列表在请求中发送的头。
实施“ 415不支持的媒体类型”
现在已经不适用了。(见上文)。

trans-unit.source: make it possible to add custom values to errors.
trans-unit.target: 使得在错误中添加自定义值成为可能。

trans-unit.source: make sure we use Pyramid’s exceptions. Not Webob’s.
trans-unit.target: 确保我们使用Pyramid的例外。不是韦伯的。

trans-unit.source: method to Service class to support subclasses wrapping the view callables w/ decorators
trans-unit.target: 方法到Service类,以支持子类包装视图可调用的装饰符。

trans-unit.source: now accept colander schema node instances. Previously only schema classes were accepted. For some discussion see #412.
trans-unit.target: 现在接受colander模式节点实例。以前只接受模式类。一些讨论见#412。

trans-unit.source: now errors status can be different from 400.
trans-unit.target: 现在错误状态可以和400不同。

trans-unit.source: now receives the request instead of errors (#381)
trans-unit.target: 现在收到请求而不是错误(#381)

trans-unit.source: parameters are not supported anymore on services
refactored the internal APIs so we are not using decorators anymore. The service definition is now separated from the service registration in the routing mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 重构了内部API,所以我们不再使用装饰器。现在服务定义与路由机制中的服务注册分开了。

trans-unit.source: remove singleton “_defined” state from Service class; this allows service definitions to be loaded into more than one Configurator.
trans-unit.target: 从Service类中删除单例“ _defined”状态；这允许将服务定义加载到多个配置器中。
将 cornice.schemas 重命名为 cornice.errors。

trans-unit.source: six is now a required dependency.
so that it does nothing if
support both marshmallow 2.x and 3.x unknown key handling (@ergo, #495)
the sphinx extension is now provided by the
trans-unit.target: 狮身人面像的扩展是由现在的

trans-unit.source: use pcreate rather than paster create.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pcreate 而不是 paster create。

trans-unit.source: were expected as view arguments (whereas deprecated since 1.0)
trans-unit.target: 被认为是视图参数(而从1.0开始被废弃)
